trans_title: 农舍翻新大作战 第三季
introduction: Siblings Billy Pearson and Carolyn Wilbrink are a professional renovation team who grew up on their own family’s farm, learning firsthand how to restore and reclaim the charm of heritage homes. In Farmhouse Facelift, Carolyn’s stunning designs and Billy’s custom craftsmanship tackle the toughest farmhouse renovations, bringing beautiful designs and customized modern conveniences to each new project. Breathing new life into these spectacular vintage spaces, they give each project a fresh start for the next generation of homeowners.EPISODE 1 New Farmhouse CharmEPISODE 2 Guesthouse In BloomEPISODE 3 Farm-Fresh RenoEPISODE 4 A+ Schoolhouse RenoEPISODE 5 Seven Generations and CountingEPISODE 6 Minimalist MasterpieceEPISODE 7 Wine Country FarmhouseEPISODE 8 An Entertaining RenoProduction companies: Be Collective Media, Sonar Entertainment
chinese_title: 农舍翻新大作战 第三季
